title: Carrey’s ex ‘overdosed on star’s pills’
text:
Email a friend 
JIM Carrey’s ex-girlfriend, Cathriona White, reportedly took her own life by overdosing on drugs prescribed to the troubled comedian. 
TMZ reported the 28-year-old Irish makeup artist, who split from the 53-year-old actor shortly before her death, overdosed on three medications: the painkiller Percocet, sleep aid Ambien and blood-pressure medication Propranolol. 
The drugs were all prescribed by the same doctor to a fictitious male, confirmed as an alias of Carrey. The empty bottles were found at White’s bedside in her LA home. 
Police now reportedly wish to interview Carrey. Shocking details ... Cathriona White reportedly overdosed on drugs prescribed to Jim Carrey. Picture: AKM-GSI/Splash News Source: Supplied 
TMZ reported White’s body was discovered at her rented California home by five friends. She called them saying she was upset because The Truman Show unexpectedly broke up with her on September 24. 
He claimed White had stalled in a course called the Survival Rundown that can take “hundreds of hours to complete,” and that it may have played a role in her death. 
A rep for the controversial church denied these claims. Rekindled romance ... Jim Carrey and Cathriona White leave their New York hotel on May 21, 2015. Picture: Splash News Source: Supplied 
People magazine reports Carrey will fly to Ireland for White’s funeral. 
“Jim has been left devastated after the tragic death of Cathriona. Attending her funeral in Ireland will be the least he could do to pay tribute to the woman he loved,” a source said. 
“He has been in touch with Cathriona’s family and they want him at the funeral. They know how much he meant to her.”
